TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputBindingCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class InputBindingCollection Implements IList
public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wszystkie obiekty, które pochodzą z ma o nazwie .All objects that derive from have an named . Wszystkie obiekty, które pochodzą z ma o nazwie .All objects that derive from have an named . Jednak jeśli te kolekcje są ustawiane w [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], elementów w kolekcji musi być klas pochodnych zamiast bezpośredniego obiektów.However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. Jest to spowodowane nie obsługuje domyślnego konstruktora publicznego.This is because does not support a default public constructor. W związku z tym elementy który został ustawiony [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] zazwyczaj będzie klasy, która obsługuje domyślnego konstruktora publicznego, takich jak lub .Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples Poniższy przykład tworzy i kojarzy ją z .The following example creates a and associates it with a . Jest dodawany do na .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

[!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] Przykład dosłownie nie używa , ale nosi nazwę niejawnie przez [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] przetwarzania obsługi dla kolekcji.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use , but is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections. Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] i kolekcji, zobacz [omówienie XAML (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
